properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Bwana awabariki
Bwana awabariki
(Bwana)
awabariki milele.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ukimcha Mungu - Bwana awabariki.
Na kutembea - Bwana awabariki.
Pamoja naye - Bwana awabariki.
Heri ni yako - Bwana awabariki.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Na mke wako - Bwana awabariki.
Atastawi - Bwana awabariki.
Kama mzabibu - Bwana awabariki.
Wenye matunda - Bwana awabariki.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Watoto wako - Bwana awabariki.
Watafanana - Bwana awabariki.
Na machipuko - Bwana awabariki.
Ya mzeituni - Bwana awabariki.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ubarikiwe - Bwana awabariki.
Kutoka Saioni - Bwana awabariki.
Maishani mwetu - Bwana awabariki.
Amani kwako - Bwana awabariki.
